Package org.neo4j.consistency.checking.cache

Class DefaultCacheAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.consistency.checking.cache.DefaultCacheAccess
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CacheAccess
    public class DefaultCacheAccess
extends Object
implements CacheAccess
    CacheAccess that uses PackedMultiFieldCache for cache.

        Description copied from interface: CacheAccess
        Sets the slot sizes of the cached values. Also clears the cache.
        Specified by:
        setCacheSlotSizesAndClear in interface CacheAccess
        Parameters:
        slotSizes - defines how many and how big the slots are for cached values that are put after this call.

      • setPivotId

        public void setPivotId​(long pivotId)
        Description copied from interface: CacheAccess
        Sets the node id that is 0, such that all cache interactions uses this pivot node id to calculate the actual node id. This is because the node id is used as index into the cache and the cache may be used to run multiple iterations over a store, where only parts of the store is checked.
        Specified by:
        setPivotId in interface CacheAccess

      • translate

        private long translate​(long id)

      • setForward

        public void setForward​(boolean forward)
        Description copied from interface: CacheAccess
        Tells this CacheAccess whether or not the current stage, i.e is scanning forwards or backwards through a store or not. The cached values are treated differently depending on which. This is due to the double-linked nature of some stores, specifically the relationship store.
        Specified by:
        setForward in interface CacheAccess
        Parameters:
        forward - true if the current scanning is forwards, otherwise it's backwards.

      • isForward

        public boolean isForward()
        Description copied from interface: CacheAccess
        A flag for record checkers using this cache, where cached values are treated differently if we're scanning through a store forwards or backwards.
        Specified by:
        isForward in interface CacheAccess
        Returns:
        true if the scanning is currently set to go forward.

      • prepareForProcessingOfSingleStore

        public void prepareForProcessingOfSingleStore​(long recordsPerCpu)
        Specified by:
        prepareForProcessingOfSingleStore in interface CacheAccess
